sentences: Thierry Amar (contrabass) is now a member of Godspeed You!
He has played in Luftmentsch Fareyn (with Josh Dolgin, and was a founding member of Le Petit Théâtre de l'Absolu, a puppet theatre that toured through Israel and the West Bank in 2003.
He worked in Vermont for the Bread and Puppet Theatre, and was a co-founder of Le Petit Théâtre de l'Absolu.
